# How to Watch Bhaag Milkha Bhaag Full Movie Online in HD Quality
 
Bhaag Milkha Bhaag is a 2013 biographical sports drama film based on the life of Indian athlete Milkha Singh, who was a national champion runner and an Olympian. The film stars Farhan Akhtar as Milkha Singh, along with Sonam Kapoor, Divya Dutta, Meesha Shafi, Pavan Malhotra and Art Malik in supporting roles. The film was directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra and produced by Viacom 18 Motion Pictures and Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra Pictures.
 
The film received critical acclaim and was a commercial success, becoming the third highest-grossing Bollywood film of 2013. It also won several awards, including two National Film Awards and nine Filmfare Awards. The film was also screened at various international film festivals and was selected as India's official entry for the Best Foreign Language Film category at the 86th Academy Awards, but did not make the final shortlist.

## What is an HD Online Player?
 
An HD online player is a software or a website that allows you to stream or download movies and videos in high-definition (HD) quality. HD quality means that the resolution of the video is at least 720p (1280 x 720 pixels) or higher, which gives you a clear and sharp picture. HD online players usually support various formats and codecs, such as MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, FLV, H.264, H.265, etc.
 
There are many HD online players available on the internet, but not all of them are reliable or safe. Some of them might contain malware or viruses that can harm your device or steal your personal information. Some of them might also have annoying ads or pop-ups that can interrupt your viewing experience. Some of them might also have limited features or compatibility issues with your device or browser.
 
Therefore, you need to be careful when choosing an HD online player to watch Bhaag Milkha Bhaag full movie online in HD quality. You need to make sure that the HD online player is trustworthy, secure, fast, easy to use and compatible with your device and browser.
